department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: This is a procurement for lightweight gangways to replace the existing gangways on the Canadian Coast Guard Hero Class and Mid Shore Patrol Vessels (MSPVs).
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
### 5 Gangways for MSPV Class

**Reference Number:** PW-ML-066-28809
**Solicitation Number:** F7044-200198/B
**Publication Date:** 2022-09-16
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-28T14:00:00

This solicitation cancels and replaces previous solicitation number F7044-200198/A dated 2021-09-27 with a closing date of 2021-11-08.

The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) has a requirement to replace the existing gangways onboard the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) Hero Class / Mid Shore Patrol Vessels (MSPVs) with new Lightweight Gangways (LWKs) approved by a classification society. This will be an initial procurement for the replacement of five (5) LWKs on or before 31 March 2023.

The successful supplier will be required to provide all associated work and services as outlined in the Statement of Work (SOW). The contract includes three (3) options for additional Lightweight Gangways (LWKs) replacement and options for additional periods.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Strategic Sourcing:** Competitive
* **Evaluation Method:** Lowest Price
* **Gaining and Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person:** Daniel Durocher
* **Contact Email:** daniel.durocher@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** (873) 455-3877
* **Contact Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5

### Important Dates
* **Initial Delivery Date:** 31 March 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-10-28T14:00:00

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
